parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name the connection is identified by

parameter.name: token
parameter.description: A valid access token to access the specified Milvus instance

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: The username used to connect to the specified Milvus instance

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: The password used to connect to the specified Milvus instance

parameter.name: idleTimeout
parameter.description: The idle timeout for a connection

parameter.name: keepAliveTime
parameter.description: The time between keep-alive probes sent by the client to the server. (Default: 55 seconds)

parameter.name: keepAliveTimeout
parameter.description: The timeout duration for the server to respond to a keep-alive probe sent by the client. (Default: 20 seconds)

parameter.name: keepAliveWithoutCalls
parameter.description: Whether to send keep-alive probes without making requests. (Default: false)

parameter.name: rpcDeadline
parameter.description: The deadline for the rpc operation to be completed. The value defaults to 0, which indicates the deadline is disabled

parameter.name: connectTimeout
parameter.description: The timeout duration for this operation. (Default: 10 seconds)

parameter.name: databaseName
parameter.description: The name of the database to which the target Milvus instance belongs

parameter.name: serverName
parameter.description: The expected name of the server

parameter.name: proxyAddress
parameter.description: The proxy serverâ€™s address through which the connection is to be established

parameter.name: clientKeyPath
parameter.description: The path to the client key file for mutual authentication

parameter.name: clientPemPath
parameter.description: The path to the client PEM file for mutual authentication

parameter.name: serverPemPath
parameter.description: The path to the server PEM file for mutual authentication

parameter.name: caPemPath
parameter.description: The path to the CA PEM file for mutual authentication
